scripts.start: npm run extract:locale && npm run compile:locale && npm run gen:devEnv && npm run imageHook && cross-env NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=web --VARIANT=development webpack-dev-server --config ./config/webpack.config.js
scripts.start:dist: npm run extract:locale && npm run compile:locale && npm run gen:prodEnv && npm run imageHook && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=web --VARIANT=development webpack-dev-server --config ./config/webpack.config.js && http-server ./dist -o
scripts.build:dist: npm run extract:locale && npm run compile:locale && npm run gen:devEnv && npm run imageHook && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=web --VARIANT=development webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js
scripts.build:dist:local: npm run extract:locale && npm run compile:locale && npm run gen:prodEnv && npm run imageHook && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=web --VARIANT=development webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js
scripts.build:dist:dev-live: npm run extract:locale && npm run compile:locale && npm run gen:dev-live-Env && npm run imageHook && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=web --VARIANT=dev-live webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js && gulp buildDev
scripts.build:dist:live: npm run extract:locale && npm run compile:locale && npm run gen:prodEnv && npm run imageHook && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=web --VARIANT=production webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js && gulp buildLive
scripts.analyse: npm run extract:locale && npm run compile:locale && npm run imageHook && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=web --VARIANT=development webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js --profile --json > dist/stats.json && webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/stats.json
scripts.android:dev:start: npm run extract:locale && npm run compile:locale && npm run gen:devEnv && cross-env BABEL_ENV=app react-native start
scripts.android:prod:start: npm run extract:locale && npm run compile:locale && npm run gen:prodEnv && cross-env BABEL_ENV=app react-native start
scripts.android:dev: npm run extract:locale && npm run compile:locale && npm run gen:devEnv && cross-env BABEL_ENV=app react-native run-android
scripts.android:prod: npm run extract:locale && npm run compile:locale && npm run gen:prodEnv && cross-env BABEL_ENV=app react-native run-android --variant=release
scripts.android:cp:dev: npm run extract:locale && npm run compile:locale && npm run gen:devEnv && appcenter codepush release-react -a johnpk/guviApp -d Staging
scripts.android:cp:prod: npm run extract:locale && npm run compile:locale && npm run gen:prodEnv && appcenter codepush release-react -a johnpk/guviApp -d Production
scripts.android:prod:bundle: npm run extract:locale && npm run compile:locale && npm run gen:prodEnv && cd android && cross-env BABEL_ENV=app ./gradlew bundleRelease
scripts.ios:dev: npm run extract:locale && npm run compile:locale && npm run gen:devEnv && cross-env BABEL_ENV=app react-native run-ios
scripts.ios:prod: npm run extract:locale && npm run compile:locale && npm run gen:prodEnv && cross-env BABEL_ENV=app react-native run-ios --variant=release
